website_summaries.verdict: An affordable innerspring mattress for those who aren't interested in memory foam.
pros: Lightweight and easy to move as needed
cons: A few have said the mattress doesn't inflate to its full 6-inch height

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress because it was cheap and had decent reviews. I wasn't expecting anything super nice, just needed guest beds. This is basically a bunch of coils with a thin layer of fabric. You can feel every coil when you lay down and I'd honestly rather sleep on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: comes in a box rolled and vacuum sealed. Easy handling and opening. Mattress is 6" and PERFECT fit for bunk beds. Springs are a tad noticeable but with pad on you don't feel them at all (at least thats what kids say). I would NOT buy for adults as I can feel them even with pad. Comes with 10 year warranty. All being said its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for me, perfect for our 5 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase. Baby boy now has a big boy bed. I slept in it last night to test it out. I'm 150lbs and bed was comfortable for me so I know it will be great for my 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: candice martin

customer_reviews.title: it came to life and is a very comfortable mattress for only 6 inches
customer_reviews.text: The mattress arrived in a box, rolled and suction packed. I was a little concerned at the quality, but once the packaging was released, it came to life and is a very comfortable mattress for only 6 inches. I am thinking about buying another one, to have as a spare!
customer_reviews.author: KnockKnock

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this bed. It is very firm but comfortable. We ended up adding a small foam pad to it, but it was great even without it. (my husband likes a little softer than I do.) I would recommend this mattress to everyone. Just a heads up. Make sure you let it sit for at least a day before you use it so it can form. We opened it and let it sit for several days then we moved it to our new room.
customer_reviews.author: TVO

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: The Linenspa 6 inch Innerspring mattress is very hard. If that's what you are looking for then this bed will be perfect. If not then avoid this mattress at all cost. Personally, I would recommend getting a better quality mattress. Preferably the "Linenspa 8 inch memory foam and Innerspring" or another alternative. Spending and extra 50-60 dollars will go a long way. Pros: Cheap/Cost efficient mattress Cons: You can feel every spring. When you move there’s a loud crunching sound. Would have rated higher if it wasn't for the loud crunching sound. (98 lb person rolled over and you could hear the movement within the spring)
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Best deal around
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for some mattresses’s on a whim and I bought 2 of these immediately when I saw they were 47.18$ each for my Son big boy bed- he’s 3 years old. He have a Ikea Mydal bunkbed. They are comfortable and firm. Thank you so much I’m so happy with my purchase I ordered 11 pm on a Thursday and received 6 pm the next day w/ prime of course free trial :) His new room theme will be Minecraft. One of his Christmas gifts room makeover
customer_reviews.author: T. McQueen

customer_reviews.title: The package confused me but as soon as I let ...
customer_reviews.text: The package confused me but as soon as I let it out the bog and the air seeped through I was happ!!!! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Annais

customer_reviews.title: Hard crunchy mattress
customer_reviews.text: Hard crunchy springy mattress! So annoyed we have a guest staying and I’m embarrassed to have them sleep on this! We are more then likely going to the store to get a better quality one! Right when me and my husband went to test is out we immediately got up! You can feel every spring and there’s a loud crunch sound! Idk how this has 4 stars! Do yourself a favor and spend the extra 30-40 dollars on that other mattress you’re looking at you will thank me later!
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect my kid loved it and it fit perfectly for the top bunk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was cool, and did the job I needed
customer_reviews.text: I found it very interesting how it came in the package. Never saw a Vacuum packed box spring. It was cool, and did the job I needed. I do like it
customer_reviews.author: Robin Asquith

customer_reviews.title: Good budget mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice budget priced twin mattress. I bought it for a 3 year old grandson for sleep overs, and so far, so good. I have also tried it out and have no complaints about it. It arrived boxed and expanded upon opening. Just as expected, a good quality for a budget price for a mattress that will be used just for sleep overs.
customer_reviews.author: cmartine1

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because the price fit my budget and yes you are always worried buying online and not being able to try it out but this is an excellent mattress. I bought it with the frame that is made so you dont need a box spring and it is great. Absolutely great mattress. Love it and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: annt

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive option
customer_reviews.text: came in a box. opened it up let it unravel itself from a spiral. let it sit for a day and slept on it the same night. I slept good. what else can I say. Pro tip - use a 2 foam topper (50-70 bucks) and it will feel so much nicer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Seller is making false claims about specification
customer_reviews.text: The seller is making false claims on the size and thickness of this item. It is 1 inch shorter in thickness and width is also 1-1/2 inches shorter. The product doesn't meet the specifications and there is not much foam padding on the springs that hurt your back and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: atifiqbal

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my son's bunk bed
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice mattress and it was packaged extremely well. It came in a fairly small box because it was compressed. Be careful when you unpackage it. I'll probably buy another one of these for the spare room. That mattress has had it.
customer_reviews.author: GinDz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my daybed and trundle. I slept on this mattress and it is very comfortable and the price can't be beat. It came in a box of course all rolled up and ready to be decompressed. I wouldn't want to use this mattress for a long term adult bed, I don't think it would hold up. Remember, you are paying for what you get. But for a guest bed, daybed or a child's bed I think it is great. I approve.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: This thing showed up in a pretty small box so I was sceptical
customer_reviews.text: This thing showed up in a pretty small box so I was sceptical. Once we opened it and rolled it out it was really flat but we realized the had vacuumed it into the plastic and as soon as we cut the plastic it popped into a mattress. It's pretty firm but perfect for my 2 year old who's graduating from a crib that has a firm mattress to begin with. Overall we're very happy with this product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought the ups driver was going to hate me but it came in in a box all rolled up. Opening it was definitely fun watching it inflate. For a 6in cheap mattresses it is pretty comfortable. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: isabele

customer_reviews.title: this bed is surprisingly comfortable. I expected a pretty sad sleeping experience
customer_reviews.text: this bed is surprisingly comfortable. I expected a pretty sad sleeping experience. But I have been pleasantly surprised by this extremely inexpensive mattress! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids. No complaints were given. They seem durable and comfortable. Its been a week of them sleeping soundly. They jump on them alot and no issues so far. Super convenient packaging and setup. I would say for the price a win for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Working mom

customer_reviews.title: I like it. I fall asleep quicker and sleep deeper ...
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is firm. I like it. I fall asleep quicker and sleep deeper and longer than my previous mattress that was much more expensive and did not hold up as well. The mattress came much quicker than the expected ship date and arrived rolled up sealed in plastic in a box. Ypu have to cut the plastic off and let the mattress sit a few hours to pop up. I accidently cut a small hole into the fabric pushing to hard to cut the plastic off. The hole is mall and only I would notice it is there. Excellent value for your money. I even told a friend who needed a mattress to biuy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Asperger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say Wow! We were amazed when they arrived. Who would have thought a bed could fit into a box. It expanded and was full within a few minutes. Kids like the feel. I will update my review after a few months to let you know how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: ilovezwa

customer_reviews.title: Possible bed bug problem
customer_reviews.text: Within a few weeks of purchase, we had bed bugs infesting my boys room. I will never know if it was the mattress that started it or something else, but the timing was right on schedule for it. Terminix luckily treated everything and encased it for us, but after seeing I'm not alone with this company and reports of bedbugs, I'd suggest Amazon and the company both stop lying and do a full scale inspection.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in our overhead camper. Surprised at the comfort for such a low price. Very happy campers!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: I think it's pretty good considering its price
customer_reviews.text: It was the cheapest one i could find on amazon. I think it's pretty good considering its price. I'm not a sensitive person so i don't really see any difference between good costy mattresses and cheaper ones. This one, i barely feel the spring, it does its job. I think it's pretty neat:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best option at this price
customer_reviews.text: It is the best mattress at the price. I have been sleeping on it for a week now and I really like it. It's firm but comfortable and I did not have any problems. It arrived rolled and vacuum-sealed and gets ready for use within an hour of unpacking. The mattress is exactly as big as the dimensions given on the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: Super Firm!! Not worth it for our family!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is VERY firm. Ad in description says great from toddler to teen. I think NOT, or at least not for me!! I got 2 of these for my 4 year olds. I returned as soon as I opened from box and the mattress expanded! It never even came out of the sealed plastic bag! Save your money! We will go to the furniture/mattress store from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bed is crap
customer_reviews.text: 10% more comfy than the carpet floor lol. I knew it wouldn't be heavenly but it's caving in the middle and the springs are intrusive and noticeable .
customer_reviews.author: Davy

customer_reviews.title: A good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe it was a mattress when it arrived but when I opened it I found a well sealed, right size, beautiful soft mattress. My daughter loves it and says it pretty comfortable too. It came on time and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY KOLLMAN

customer_reviews.title: With this purchase you can forget getting a good nights rest
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and buy a real mattress. With this purchase you can forget getting a good nights rest, unless you like sleeping on concrete and have a strong desire to wake up feeling like you just spent 2 hours at the gym pounding weights. When I originally bought this mattress the price is what appealed to me. However, I have learned my lesson 1) a 6in mattress is far from comfortable-- my Box Spring is thicker which is pretty sad 2) any mattress that comes rolled up in a box should be returned immediately!!!!!!!!! 3) always always always invest in a quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome matress comes all compressed and rolled up in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome matress comes all compressed and rolled up in a box great bed for my kid I have not slept in yet but I have sat on it it's not to bad for the price I'm satisfied and so is my son he likes it
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Spend a few more $$ and purchase a better mattress
customer_reviews.text: Only got to 4", it's been over a week. Super springy, you can feel every single one...pressing into your body. Very little padding on it. My 3yr old hated sleeping on it(just to clarify, he's always been a "his own bed sleeper" and won't sleep anywhere else but his bed for nap time and bed time...so it was super weird having him come to our room every night because of "hurts")...but very much enjoys jumping on it while we wait for the pick-up for return!! We obviously have requested a return. Was packaged well and easy to set up, though! Smelled icky upon unpackaging but went away within 24hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hand

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of cautious because of some of the negative reviews for this mattress saying that you could feel the springs-but I’m happy that I took a chance and got it. It is super firm but that is good for my back. Finally woke up with no pain. If you do get it and it’s too firm for you, you could just get a mattress topper and you’d be good. Careful when opening the plastic to the mattress, it will start to expand immediately! I cut off the tape with scissors and was amazed at how quick it expanded it almost popped me in the face.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one.  Feels cheap.  Spend a little bit more and get something else.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is truly a mattress for $70 and it feels like it. Wish I would have spent the extra $30 and bought something nicer. This is a very thin mattress and I can feel the coils through the padding. This is mostly used in a child's bed, I can't imagine using it for an adult. Previously, I had purchased a cheaper mattress from Walmart.Com (Slumber 1 - 8'' Spring Mattress-In-a-Box, Multiple Sizes) for about $100. This mattress is very comfortable and I would recommend this one instead.
customer_reviews.author: spunky_m0nkey

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a twin size mattress for my 3 year old son's little loft bed and I am impressed. I was amazed by the size of the box the mattress arrived in. It was wrapped in plastic and had all the air sucked out of it. Once I removed the first layer of plastic I placed it on the bed and cut into the bottom layer of plastic, you could hear the air immediately fill the mattress. It "inflated" within seconds, I wish I would have recorded it, and was ready for use. I let it sit overnight and it was full and reached both ends of the bed. Very sturdy mattress and definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jes McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I do recommended a Topper! It went perfect with my girls bunk beds!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great structure
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This mattress has a great structure and is supportive without me feeling the springs. We'll see how it holds up. I thought this mattress was white-ish, but its actually gray. Just a heads up. The edges are bright blue so if you buy medium or low grade sheets (because... children), the blue will show through your sheets. Its a very firm mattress so if that is what you are looking for, great! If you like a softer mattress, maybe check out Linenspa's hybrid mattress with memory foam on the top? Or buy a topper. I'll come back and give this a 5 star if it holds up to my toddler this year :)
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: A blanket on a concrete floor would be a step up in comfort
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst mattress ever. It's just springs with a very..and I mean very..thin layer of, I guess, batting, and then material over that. I might as well have just bought springs and a sheet to cover them. It'd probably be cheeper and be every bit as comfortable. I wasn't expecting a luxury hotel mattress with this thing, but I wasn't expecting this junk either. My 32 lb 3 year old cant even comfortably sleep on this piece, much less anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress for an outdoor swing bed my husband made out of pallets. It is very comfy for what we are using it for. We are more than happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Best used as a box spring
customer_reviews.text: What a terrible mattress. I have another king mattress that was also a "bed-in-a-box" and it was way better quality than this mess. I unrolled it and let it inflate for atleast 8 hours(instructions say only 2-3 hours needed) because after a few hours it still did not look inflated. My boyfriend and I gave it a whirl and were highly disappointed. We each tossed and turned all night and the bed felt just like an box spring. I would save yourself the money and try another type of "bed-in-a-box"
customer_reviews.author: SunE Rae

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and surprisingly comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really comfortable mattress. It came in a box, vacuum sealed and that had me worried, considering it is an inner spring mattress. It filled out perfectly and is a great mattress for the money. I needed a quick fix for my 6’3” 15 year old son and this does the trick. When he lays completely straight - his legs hang off the end. So, I’ll need to buy a different mattress, soon. But I’ll likely skip the big box stores when I do and order another from this company. The bed came in well packaged, in time and didn’t have a funky odor (another one of my quirky concerns when buying online).
customer_reviews.author: TexasJess

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Be carefully when opening it’s rolled extremely tight for packaging. Brought this for my 3year old that’s hoping to transition to own room really soon. Didn’t want to get anything to expensive just yet. (May transfer this mattress to truddle guest bed) but so far so good. Mattress came compressed and rolled in a small box ( box does tell what’s inside I’m pretty big font so if it matters I would be home for delivery) pictured is my 240ish lbs husband laying down and he said it’ll serve the purpose for now and especially for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice for young children
customer_reviews.text: For a young child's bunk bed, this is perfect. I'm very happy with it. It is a bit shallow so if you don't want the sheet to be loose, you'll also need some of those sheet clips to go under the matress.
customer_reviews.author: D R Parrish

customer_reviews.title: I work in a prison and this mattress is worse than the inmates.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand how it could have positive reviews... this is by far the least comfortable mattress I've ever owned. It won't get used much thankfully as its a backup bed for emergency foster placements, but I still feel bad for the kids that will have to use it. I wanted something affordable since its going to be unused 95% of the time, but now I'm going to have to spend more money and buy a foam topper or something. I can't make someone sleep on this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Shlean

customer_reviews.title: Worst mattress I’ve ever purchased : (
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Buyer beware. I knew it wouldn’t be top of the line for the price.. but this is like sleeping on a piece of plywood. I am so disappointed. My teenage son was so excited for his new bed, until we put the mattress on today. It really is terrible. No cushion. You can feel the springs. And I can’t afford sending it back and not having a place for him to sleep to find something else. Perhaps a mattress topper would help some? But I can’t afford that now either. Save your money, find something better. You’ll be glad you did in the end : (
customer_reviews.author: ryan j.

customer_reviews.title: Young Adult Male Approved
customer_reviews.text: My son is on the cusp of adulthood and needed a new mattress. We received this one on Saturday (ordered it Friday) and I let him set it up. The set up was easy: take to room of choice, prepare bed/frame, open package, let mattress expand, set on frame. Super easy! He didn't wait the full 48 hours and slept on it after 24. He says it was comfortable, he slept through the night and he didn't feel any springs. He likes it a lot and noticed that it didn't smell like plastic. I don't know what that means but I count it as a win. He is very pleased with the mattress. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Optimus Crymez

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: I know this is only a 6 inch mattress but this definitely lacks the support I thought it would provide. I also own the 8inch linen spa mattress so I was comparing this to that when making the purchase. I bought this for a trundle bed which is used sparingly. But I can actually feel the trundle frame through this mattress! Not what I expected. I thought the structural support of the mattress would hold up an average person but I can definitely feel everything while on this.
customer_reviews.author: Tabeer Javed

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and opted to make the purchase based on the price point and the favorable reviews... I was in the market for a new mattress under $150 and went to Amazon expecting to be amazed as I was with my now discontinued mattresses purchase from Amazon. The shipping was fast that's the good but I don't know if I got a dud defect but this mattress did not inflate to 6" inches this is not the mattress I was expecting or paid at 4" it's rather flat more like a heavier mattress topper than mattress. Uncomfortable I felt the springs will have to look for a mattress topper....Wasted almost $150 wish I could return it...
customer_reviews.author: SchonteTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS MATTRESS :(
customer_reviews.text: I can usually find something positive about an item. Unfortunately this one has no redeeming qualities. We needed it at the beginning of COVID-19 so it had to be cost-effective. I wish I would have bought one that was more expensive. As you can see from the picture, the edges of the mattress have become soft and bend with any weight added. Within 3 months, the mattress has become uncomfortable to sleep on as you can feel the springs. Additionally, because it expands out of the box, I don't know how I'd be able to return it. If possible, spend more to get a better quality mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Springy and Firm
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition, perfect timing. Im used to a memory foam mattress , you can truly feel the springs underneath you with this mattress. I layed down and felt every spiral, it was an easy fix though l. I just bought a mattress topper here on amazon as well for a good price and it still was cheaper than buying a new sealy or serta mattress. Worked out well for me only because I added the mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: MomTwoBoys

customer_reviews.title: Great for the tots!!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good mattresses for the price! I got them for my 2daughters ages 9&6 and they work perfect for them. Now for me and my husband on the other hand these wouldn’t be thick enough we put the mattress on metal platform bed frames no boxspring needed(but could possibly improve the sleep quality for these) and with our weights it’s not as comfortable for us as it appears to be for the tots! I would definitely buy these again for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Tiera

customer_reviews.title: Springs indeed and request shipping info
customer_reviews.text: We've added memory foam over this mattress. It's ok for a child's bunk bed. The hassles of it being shipped by the US post office rather than UPS or someone more accustomed to delivering larger packages was not worth it. Post office first refused to deliver, claiming 'unsafe to leave' on covered porch despite all other packages routinely delivered there. THen we signed off to ok unattended delivery, only to be told it was 'too heavy,' so we eventually had to drive 15 minutes to a post office to retrieve the product, after calling and trying to resolve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: if this mattress and my other expensive mattress got in a fight, this mattress would win.
customer_reviews.text: This was the coolest thing ever. I did not believe I could order a quality mattress through the mail. When I saw the small box it arrived in, I thought "No way". The box was light enough for me to carry up the stairs. The mattress was vacuum packed and as soon as I cut through the thick plastic covering, I could hear it sucking in air as though it was breathing in life. It went from a thin folded mass to a real twin-size mattress! It is just as good as any of my other expensive mattresses. I want to buy another one just so I can watch the transformation again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Buy only if you like sleeping with coils in your back
customer_reviews.text: This should be sold as a box spring, not a mattress because you feel every spring in it when you lay down on it. The layer of foam on top must be the thickness of a tissue. This is a horrible mattress! What’s worse is I can’t return it because there’s no way to roll it back up and fit it in the box now that it’s out of the plastic wrap that kept it deflated. This may be one of my worst Amazon purchases. So now I’m out $100 and still have to buy another mattress. I’m pissed Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I wanted to write one for this because I know just how hard shopping for a mattress can be. This mattress was purchased for my daughter's bed, and it exceeds my expectations! For little over $60 I was a little worried, but this thing is comfy! Would I buy one for my bed? No, only because I look for mattresses that will last me a decade or more. This isn't a good choice if you are worried about the bounce factor, but for one person it's great! Would I buy more for my kids? Absolutely! It is comfortable and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL HABERL

customer_reviews.title: Strong and firm
customer_reviews.text: After spending hundreds of dollars in memory foam mattress and unconfortable nights and days trying to wake up and or sitting just got Tired of memory foam mattress, wich make you a holes on it while sitting or laying down and the worst when trying to push you up using your hands they just get deeper and more difficult to move.And make it hard for you to wake up and everything else. I love this one very firm and keep your hole body straight like it's supposed to it's not too confy but at the end it's better to the health wich is what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Ramos

customer_reviews.title: don't be surprised at how it is packed at factory
customer_reviews.text: wasn't sure of what to expect. when I saw the package my first thought was to send it back because the box was so small. when I opened the box it almost exploded when it came out and I reread the description to reassure myself that this was what I ordered. It does support your body weight nicely and feels firm. the quality is good and appears to b a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: sadsack

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the price! No complaints at all from my kids, they love the mattresses. I read the other reviews but I would say if you need a cheap good mattress this is the one to buy. I bought a cover for the two I got for my kids and with plenty of blankets they are very comfortable. And no I am not paid by the company, just happy that I got a couple of cheap mattresses that are actually good ones!
customer_reviews.author: ABucklin

customer_reviews.title: Mattress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these mattress for my kids beds. They came quickly but when they arrived were in small boxes which I found strange. After opening them I thought it wasn’t a mattress in there and I ordered a mattress cover but as soon as I spilt the plastic open out pops the mattress it kind of inflated because it was like vacuum sealed which I’ve never seen before. They fit on my kids bed perfectly. I could sort of feel the springs so it could be softer but I really like the grey color and overall they are decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: whitneyid

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for my new apartment. It is a heavy box so you may need another person to help lug it with you. You cut the wrapping and the mattress does inflate on the spot. I recommend placing the mattress on the bed first to avoid lifting the mattress onto the bed. Once I added my comforter set, it has been amazing. My back doesn't hurt anymore, and I fell asleep immediately. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: The shape is weird
customer_reviews.text: ...I haven't slept in a bed where I am for quite a few years...and ended up using this mattress for a bed my fiance made...but it is a strange shape...not rectangular at all. It is slanted on the sides...very strange! I recently got a spinal cord injury and have a lot of neuropathic pain in my legs and hips...and when i went to make this review, one of the thing it wanted a rating on was 'pain relief'. There is definitely not enough support in this mattress to offer pain relief and you can't sleep on them stacked because of the weird shape.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Calvi

customer_reviews.title: Pure Perfection
customer_reviews.text: No words to describe the quality of this amazing product. This mattress has these phenomenal coils that immediately relieved a lot of my back pain. I don't use a box spring because of back problems. This lovely mattress conforms to my every position. It's cool and comfortable too, and does not contain gel memory foam, of which I am very allergic. Seems all mattresses are made with that awful gel memory foam, these days. But this wonderful company makes this mattress very simply and very wonderfully without it. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Pjm

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable even for an adult!
customer_reviews.text: I needed two mattresses for both my kids so I decided to give this product a shot considering that prices in mattress stores were waaayyy out of my budget. 1. The price is great. 2. These are rolled up and boxed. Easy to carry, easy to handle. Once you open the plastic bag they quickly shape into their real size. 3. These mattresses are surprisingly comfortable even for an adult. The last time I bought mattresses for my kids was about 4 years ago, also online, but those where not as good, I could feel the springs. These are much better, I don’t feel the springs at all. If you are on a tight budget I definitely recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: The Octopus

customer_reviews.title: Super hard and can feel coils
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what I expected given the price, but in retrospect I would have rather paid another $100 dollars for a better mattress. I was only looking for something cheap for a guest bedroom and expected to buy a mattress topper though the reviews made it seem not quit as bad as it is. I would say pass on this and find the next cheapest mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Great box spring.
customer_reviews.text: I need to preface this by saying that we are using this as more of a boxspring than a mattress. We have an 8in memory foam mattress and a 3in gel foam topper. However, I wanted an innerspring mattress underneath them to provide more give. (I’ve been having hip pain.) This mattress was $150 (king) marked down to $125 or so. This was much cheaper than average and still decently reviewed. All that being said, I wouldn’t sleep directly on this thing. But for my needs, the quality is great. My bed is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Be aware.  Bed bug!!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I got a bedbug from brand new mattress. But we got bite marks as soon as we purchased and tried within a week. Then I didnt see any visible evidence. We got it out with plastic wrapped in a garage anyway. A year later, we found full grown beg bugs inside of the plastic wrap. It's a shame that new mattress were selling with bedbugs.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t get this mattress. I don’t ever post a review like this, but the mattress smells like chemicals. After doing a word search on “smell” for this product, a whole bunch of other reviews popped up complaining about the horrible chemical smell. (I was wondering if I just got a bad mattress.) I have never ever known of a mattress to have any such smell. Trying to convince my husband it isn’t safe, and to get rid of it. Trying also to warn anyone who is going to think buying this cheap mattress is a good idea. Please, don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress for kids. Its easy to setup and light enough to lift and move. Not a lot of foam so again I would get this for a kid not an adult. We bought our first mattress a year ago and it is still in great condition. We went back and recently bought another to go under his bed for guest and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mezzy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us..
customer_reviews.text: I really dislike giving less than wonderful reviews,we tried to like this mattress but ended up having to return/get refund. My son (he's 15 and weighs 102lbs) kept getting poked by springs! The first one was right at his hip area so we turned the mattress around and put a topper on it but then another spring started poking him too. A topper didn't help at all .. It wasn't an expensive mattress, so I wasn't expecting exceptional wonderfulness but the reviews were good and I didn't expect bad springs poking out everywhere within the first couple months. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: BethanyW

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress for a younger child
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress because my 8 year old had outgrown her smaller, little kid style mattress. She likes it very much. She says it’s much more like her big sisters’ mattresses 😂. The mattress came rolled up in a box. We opened the box and cut the packaging around the mattress, allowing it to unfold. We let it sit out, overnight, to allow it to fully expand and it has done its job since.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Vickery

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kids - Wouldn't recommend for Adults
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed for our children's bunk bed. It was a great price and delivered pretty quickly. We wanted a shorter mattress for safety so that the bars of the metal bed would keep them from falling out of bed. I didn't want to spend much money because they are still occasional bed wetters. I'm happy with it and would buy again for a kids bunk bed. I wouldn't recommend for an adult. You might want something a little more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Longoria, MSM

customer_reviews.title: Kid mattress
customer_reviews.text: So I brought this mattress for our 15 year old daughter who was due for another mattress. I think the mattress is a little to hard , but I purchased a mattress topper and now she likes the bed. I would only purchase this , if you needed something for right now until you can get something a bit more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: It's an affordable daybed mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very comfortable mattress, but it serves it's purpose. We got this for our daybed. It's great for sitting and resting but not sleeping. I take naps on it. I will be getting a mattress pad for it. However, I bought it for the daybed, so fortunately it's not meant for nightly use. If you need an inexpensive mattress quickly, this is a good buy. If you need one to sleep on for a while ... not a great buy. I am neither happy with or unhappy with this purchase. It reminded me of my college dorm mattress.
customer_reviews.author: M.G. Trehern

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This product DID NOT come with bed bugs and hard to imagine it would with the way it was air tight and vacuum sealed in plastic. Bought this for my large Labrador mix. Relatively comfortable for the price but I agree that it is just a piece of fabric over some coils. Bought a mattress topper and of course some dog blankets and it was better for him. He sleeps soundly on his mattress but I know just how flimsy this is and it will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Stu the Janitor

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for triplets moving out of cribs, so the price was right. Once they popped open, I thought the mattresses would be fine. After about 2 hours they stopped expanding. The mattresses are about 4.5 inches thick, 36 inches wide, and 76 inches long...aka not twin size. I emailed customer service and they instructed me to return through Amazon, which is fine, but I just went with them because, well, triplets. So 2 stars because I was too lazy to return them, but seriously they are too small and thin to think anyone over 50 pounds would be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price! I recommend this mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mattresses for my young boys beds about a year ago. Right now they're on a platform base without a box spring. They are fine for kids. Actually my husband has slept on them and a relative has slept on it while visiting and have no complaints. I would never buy this mattress for myself for daily use, I can imagine it would break down quickly and the springs would hurt...like expected from a spring mattress. The price was great and I would recommend this for a guest or child's bedroom (with a mattress pad or topper).
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Hard mattress, barely no foam
customer_reviews.text: I like hard mattresses. Having said that, I must say that this is very hard. The foam is VERY thin, and it's almost like all coils with a cover. I bought this really as an extra bed that will usually be lying under a good softer mattress, like a box spring. Just wanted something that can double up as an extra mattress when we have visitors. For that it works perfectly. This is the cheapest full size mattress I could find. As a daily use primary mattress, this is a tough choice - literally and figuratively.
customer_reviews.author: Thomman

customer_reviews.title: It's fine
customer_reviews.text: I needed a thin mattress to use with my very good memory foam topper for a loft bed. This was the thinnest one I could find. Laying on it by itself is not really that comfortable and you do kind of know the coils are there while laying on it. With the 3 1/2 inch topper, you don't even feel them. So, you should get this mattress with the intention of getting a quality memory foam topper on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress
customer_reviews.text: If you want a really comfortable, inexpensive, good quality mattress, then this is the one for you. I was reluctant to purchase due to some of the reviews. Disregard the negative reviews...some people are negative, only to be negative, it's all they know how to be. My purchased mattress arrived in good condition, I removed from box, unwrapped mattress & it rolled out flat, unwrapped the vacuum sealed wrap & it expanded full size in less than a minute. ZERO issues with the mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Anderson

customer_reviews.title: They can't be serious
customer_reviews.text: I was fooled by the almost 5 star 3k reviews. You can definitely feel the springs by just lightly rubbing your hands over the top. It's ridiculous. I got this for my 2.5 yo. Since she is only around 35lbs I thought that it would not matter. There is literally just a thin sheet of fabric over the springs. This would have gone straight back, however we had some unused memory foam that was about 3" thick and cut it to size. Now it is VERY comfy. I'm 255lbs and took a nap on it yesterday. Very comfy.

customer_reviews.title: The most uncomfortable mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my 9 year old’s loft bed. He had it a couple weeks and I just tried it out. It’s awful. You can feel every spring. It digs into your back. I even caught my foot on a spring when stretching out. I wish I realized this sooner and we could return it! I’m purchasing him a different mattress that will hopefully be much more comfortable. In the mean time, my son would rather sleep on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable. but oh so cheap
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it if you're considering purschasing this mattress, you are looking for cheap. If you want a nice comfy bed look elsewhere, but for this price I am amazed you can buy any matteress This bed is extremely hard, noisy, and you feel every spring. Although it is incredibly uncomfortable, it is a matteress and a place where a guest can sleep without wanting to over stay their welcome. As uncomfortable as this mattress is, I cannot beleive you are able to buy a mattress this cheap. This is the cheapest mattress out there, so temper your expectations and if you decided to go this route buy a comforter. 3 stars, not for comfort but that low low price.
customer_reviews.author: Ay-Dub

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s a decent mattress for a toddler. Just moved my 3 year old into a twin and I didn’t want to blow the budget on a mattress that would just be beat up. I wouldn’t recommend for older children/adults though. It wasn’t 6inch thick as described just a little over 4.5inch which like I said is fine for my toddler. It’ll do! Like they say, you get what you pay for. No big deal here.
customer_reviews.author: K. Marie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these mattresses for children and  toddler under 80 pounds
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and I basically decided to buy the mattresses and see for myself I purchased two mattresses For a bunkbed. I have them for a couple of weeks now and my granddaughter slept all night without getting up LOL. So I guess the mattresses are comfortable to her so yes I recommend purchasing this mattress The mattress is pretty firm too
customer_reviews.author: Action Jackson

customer_reviews.title: You can feel every spring!
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better than to get a value priced mattress...this item shipped quickly and in good condition, which is why my review is a generous two stars. I bought this mattress for my 60 lb. son, and knew instantly I had to get a foam mattress topper for him as well. You can feel every single spring, and you can hear them grinding on each other even under his small weight. Avoid this product unless you have at least a 4 inch foam topper to use as well!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Clausen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Mattress
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress a few days ago for our kids. It came just as everyone mentioned- rolled and vacuum sealed. Once that plastic seal was broken, the mattresses began to take shape and took less than 1 minute to fully form. It was actually fun for the kids to watch. The mattresses fit the beds without a problem and although I could still sort of feel the spring (weigh 165), it was quite comfortable and firm. The boys slept just fine on it and had no concerns. Great price and quality mattress. Can’t find anything bad to say!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Smells like mildew and mold
customer_reviews.text: I bought the sameness mattress for our daughter a few years ago and then our little boy just got a big boy bed so we bought the same mattress again. However this time this mattress has horrible mildew and mold smell. It’s horrible we even tried baking soda and other cleaners to remove smell and did nit perk. So disappointed because it’s been now 1.5 weeks our little boy hasn’t been able to sleep in his new twin bed. No happy and can’t return it because it was vacuumed seal and box won’t work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S Couch

customer_reviews.title: Great low-budget "first mattress!"
customer_reviews.text: We bought the cali king size, and for the price, it's excellent. Yes, we can feel the springs, but really only if we lay funny to begin with. A small adjustment and we're comfy again. Our 1 year old sleeps with us, and I swear he started sleeping better than he was in our pillow-top, memory foam, all-out fancy mattress! (If anyone is wondering why we ditched that, it was a 3 generations hand me down, and we had a flood that molded it.) All in all, we're happy with it and definitely recommend it, especially as a first new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Serious Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mattresses for a twin bunk bed set that I just recently got and I wanted something that would be comfortable for when my family and their kids (my grandkids) come up. This mattress is so worth the money. It supports me and I'm no lightweight and it is extremely comfortable. I don't have any pain in my back laying on this mattress and I sleep really good on it. I'm totally impressed and would recommend Linenspa to any one that is looking for a quality mattress at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: GermanyRose

customer_reviews.title: My teenager loves this mattress
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my teenager's mattress, but didn't want to spend and arm and a leg. This was just what I was looking for. I haven't slept on it myself, but she must be happy because she hasn't complained about it once. So if a teenager hasn't complained, it must be pretty ok.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good matress for a kids bunk bed.
customer_reviews.text: I got this mattress for my daughter's bunk bed (she needed a new one). The mattress came compressed in a small box. After we cut it out of it's wrapping, the mattress expanded quickly. The mattress fits my daughter's twin bunk bed just fine. And she has had no problem sleeping on it. Though I would not recommend it for an adult. When I laid on it I definitely felt the springs. If you are using it for an adult I would invest in a mattress topper for sure. However, it is a decent mattress for it's price and works well for a kids bunk bed.
customer_reviews.author: TheQuietGrove

customer_reviews.title: put two layers of blankets on
customer_reviews.text: My previous two airbeds broke after half an year of use so that's about 150 dollars wasted. Instead of an airbed, I decided to get a inexpensive mattress instead since it is not for long term use. This mattress is not sturdy made. You can feel the spring and hear moving noise. The firm is medium to me. I ended up putting two layer of blankets on it so it is more comfortable. However, in summer, it might be too hot with two layers of blankets. It is not expensive and too difficult to return so I will keep it. However, it is not something i will recommend others to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelearn

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A COMFORT AT A GREAT PRICE! ............
customer_reviews.text: This mattress beautifully made and a sleep comfort for my back! This is NOT you are getting a "cheap" mattress at a "cheap" price BUT is you are getting a "GREAT" mattress at a cheap price!!! A mattress with springs full size and 6 inch height. 10 out of 5 stars! If I had a guest room I would order ANOTHER mattress! I slept on mattress and in "SEVENTH BACK HEAVEN!" Highly recommend TO BUY!
customer_reviews.author: spencer drate

customer_reviews.title: Not bad overall, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The Twin size mattress came rolled up in double plastic wrap. The mattress we had decompressed for 2 days and only reached 5 inches. Did NOT get to 6 inches thick even after a week. It's definitely a firm mattress. You can feel and see the steel coils. (Recommend a thick topper). Our little guy doesn't mind though as he uses the bed for a trampoline! For the price it's not a bad deal. It's a good bed for young kids or a guest room. If you buy this mattress, buy a topper too.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana A.

customer_reviews.title: Save your $$$ DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive mattress for our kids new bunk bed. Thought it was a good price and with 11k 4star reviews you would assume it’s pretty good! This mattress is JUST COILS with a thin covering on top. Even though it’s for kids ages 4 & 6 there is no way I’d make them sleep on this. From a mom that loves a good discount but appreciates quality as well, SKIP THIS MATTRESS 👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Joelle s

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooooo comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooooooo comfortable! !! I was also confused when box arrived because it was long skinny box , but its a compressed mattress rooled up once open seal it pops ,spring normal very nice packaging best i ever seen... i love it want to buy 2more and recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive mattress, cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I wanted an inexpensive twin mattress for our daybed/trundle bed. It's used mostly as a sofa and occasionally when we have overnight guests. The mattress was certainly inexpensive, but I should have spent more on a different one. It was all right for the first couple of weeks, but after that the spring coils became really uncomfortable. The mattress is lumpy, provides differing levels of support in different places, and did not make it 12 months before we had to replace it. If you're desperate for a mattress and this is all you can afford... sleep on the floor until you can afford a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Boston BeauTease

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little more money
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say that I think this mattress isn’t worth the amount I paid for it, it is, but I should have spent another $30-40 and had a decent quality mattress. Ya get what ya pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is without any doubt the worst mattress that I ever owned. It's that bad that two months after purchase I decided to buy another mattress from different manufacturer. It's not only uncomfortable, but it's also extremely sensitive on pressure, so if you are not careful, you might actually feel wires inside with your elbows quite often. If you accidentally make stronger pressure few times at same place, you can expect to end up with permanent damage in form of distorted wires inside it. Ticker and much better quality mattresses are available for same money at most of local furniture stores, so there is no need to waste money on this overpriced low quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

product_meta.title: Linenspa 6-Inch Innerspring Mattress - Full XL
product_meta.description: Size:Full XL| Style Name:Mattress OnlyGet a restful night's sleep on this traditional spring mattress from LinenSpa. A quilted fabric cover and inner foam layer provide comfort and resilience, while heavy gauge steel coils offer lasting support. Because your family's safety is as important as its comfort, this spring mattress has a fire resistant barrier that's tested to ensure it meets safety standards. For easy shipping and simple set up, this mattress comes compressed and rolled. Note: product trim color may vary by size. Materials -Cover - 100% Polyester, Inner Material - 62% Polyester Fiber, 18% Rayon Fiber, 15% Polyurethane Foam, 5% Polypropylene Fiber.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Linenspa 6-Inch Innerspring Mattress, in Full XL Size
Item's dimensions: 54" W x 80"L x 6"H. Feel: Firm
Fits Box Springs, Slatted/Platform bed frame and metal grids
Remove packaging within 72 hours, and allow an extra 48-72 hours for proper decompression
The Linenspa 6-Inch Innerspring Mattress is a comfortable, supportive option for toddlers, kids, and teens as their bodies grow and develop

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars19,177 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
